doc.citation: Family Trust Distribution Tax (Secondary Liability) Act 1998

chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Family Trust Distribution Tax (Secondary Liability) Act 1998 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Family Trust Distribution Tax
         (Secondary Liability) Act 1998.

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Family Trust Distribution Tax (Secondary Liability) Act 1998 > Section 2
chunks.text:
This Act commences on the day on which it receives the Royal
         Assent.

chunks.title: Section 3 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Family Trust Distribution Tax (Secondary Liability) Act 1998 > Section 3
chunks.text:
Tax payable under sectionÂ 271-60 or 271-65 in ScheduleÂ 2F to
         the Income Tax Assessment Act 1936 on an unpaid amount is imposed.

chunks.title: Section 4 - Amount of tax
chunks.structure_path: Family Trust Distribution Tax (Secondary Liability) Act 1998 > Section 4
chunks.text:
The amount of the tax imposed by this Act is equal to the
         unpaid amount.
